text: Paul J. Smith (October 30, 1906 - January 25, 1985) is an American composer. He was best known for his work at Disney.Disney's Complete "Silly Symphony" Soundtrack Collection-Cartoon Research ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1906 births Category:1985 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:American movie score composers Category:Musicians from Michigan
title: Paul Smith (composer)
